plastic bottle.disposal_tip: Rinse and remove the cap before recycling.
plastic bottle.reuse_tip: Make a bird feeder or self-watering planter.

glass jar.disposal_tip: Clean and dry before placing in recycling bin.
glass jar.reuse_tip: Use as food storage or for crafts.

newspaper.reuse_tip: Use for gift wrap or cleaning windows.

aluminum can.disposal_tip: Rinse and crush to save space.
aluminum can.reuse_tip: Turn into pen holders or art projects.

banana peel.disposal_tip: Place in a compost bin or bury in garden soil.
banana peel.reuse_tip: Use to fertilize plants or polish shoes.

apple core.reuse_tip: Feed to backyard animals or compost.

vegetable scraps.disposal_tip: Save for homemade stock or compost.

envelope.disposal_tip: Recycle clean envelopes, remove plastic window.
envelope.reuse_tip: Use as note paper or bookmarks.

mobile phone.reuse_tip: Use for spare parts or donate.

old charger.reuse_tip: Donate to local tech repair shops.

paint can.disposal_tip: Take to hazardous waste disposal centers.

chip bag.reuse_tip: Use in crafts or as packing material.

styrofoam cup.reuse_tip: Use for DIY insulation or crafts.
